content.raw:
I'm thinking the right thing to do here is probably to use `target_include_directories(${target_name} INTERFACE ${${ign_import_target_INCLUDE_VAR}})` and get rid of the loop altogether.

It wound up like this because I tried something like `set_target_properties(${target_name} PROPERTIES INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ${${ign_import_target_INCLUDE_VAR}})` and it caused errors during compilation because it tried to treat the entire list as a single directory name. Putting it in a loop appeared to solve the problem, but it probably only removed one problem and introduced another.
